name: Future Technology Adoption
description: Survey how users feel about the adoption of emerging technologies like artificial intelligence, blockchain, or virtual reality.

name: Remote Work Satisfaction
description: Investigate the experiences of individuals working remotely. Assess the challenges, benefits, and preferences for remote work.

name: Mental Health Awareness
description: Examine the awareness and attitudes towards mental health. Explore how people perceive mental health issues

name: Environmental Concerns
description: Gauge public concern and awareness about environmental issues such as climate change, pollution, and sustainability.

name: Health and Fitness Trends
description: Explore current health and fitness trends, including preferred workout methods, dietary choices, and overall wellness practices.

name: Entertainment Consumption Habits
description: Investigate how people consume entertainment, including preferences for streaming services, gaming habits, and social media usage.
